title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: There is a bug in the Photon version where the popup menu is not appearing when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
OB: When I open a Java editor and right-click on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu appears to add breakpoints or marks.
EB: When I open a Java editor and right-click on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear to allow me to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. A popup menu should appear, allowing you to add breakpoints or marks.
